rune.sacrifices: Sacrifice - 1x Gold Axe + 1x Coal block + 18 XP levels - 1x Gold Pickaxe + 4x TNT + 18 XP levels - 1x Gold Shovel + 3x Sandstone + 18 XP levels - 1x Gold Sword + 1x Glowstone Block + 18 XP levels
rune.description:
Description Spawns either a spirit axe, a spirit pickaxe, a spirit shovel or a spirit sword. All spirit tools comes with bonus enchantments and automatically repair with lapis dust.
Hold right click to charge your spirit tool and break a bigger area. When charged, spirit tool as a chance to drop Plant, Lapis, Glowstone or Gunpowder dust, depending on your XP level.
